name: Valerie
summary:
Valerie is a 2D platforming adventure game with a focus on narrative, characters and bubbles! It follows the story of our protagonist, Valerie:

Having crash-landed a plane on a snowy mountainside, Valerie is rescued by two children whose dad has gone missing. Despite being stranded herself, she becomes wrapped up in their circumstances and sets out to help them while uncovering their unique situation. Companionship, danger and magic awaits!
